definition: to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department

sentences.english: The C++ standard allows for the copy constructor to be elided in certain situations.
sentences.chinese: 標準的允許拷貝構造函數要省略在某些情況下。

sentences.english: For simplicity, the synchronization of data with the server is omitted.
sentences.chinese: 爲簡單起見，此處省略服務器段的數據同步。

sentences.english: Probe into advertising language are of important and special function.
sentences.chinese: 探究省略句在廣告中所發揮的重要而特殊的作用。

sentences.english: The ellipsis is the punctuation mark (…) that indicates an intentional omission.
sentences.chinese: 省略號表示的是作者蓄意的省略。

sentences.english: Omission of a final or initial sound in pronunciation.
Here I need to put a long series of ellipsis so I account for no details.
sentences.chinese: 後來就是一長串的省略號，就不細說了。

sentences.english: Elliptically both sides armrest, more facilitating activity.
sentences.chinese: 省略兩旁扶手，更便於活動。

sentences.english: The design team was able to dispense with the time-consuming steps of welding on the seat and back rest.
sentences.chinese: 設計團隊省略生產時焊接研磨的繁瑣步驟與工時。

sentences.english: In a single-species fluid, the subscript may be dropped.
sentences.chinese: 對於單組分流體，這個下標可以省略。

sentences.english: Avoid lazy text-inspired speak, with overuse of dot-dot-dot’s and consecutive commas.
sentences.chinese: 過多使用省略號和連續逗號。

sentences.english: The second paragraph can be omitted.
Omitted on Holy Thursday, at the mass of Pascha night, and at funeral liturgies .
sentences.chinese: 省略的聖週四，在大規模的復活節晚上，在葬禮。

sentences.english: Leading a horse from a walk to a canter omits the three-beat trot.
sentences.chinese: 從領導到馬散步慢跑省略三拍小跑。

sentences.english: Re-enter the alias name, omitting the incorrect character.
sentences.chinese: 重新輸入別名並省略不正確字符。

definition: to omit/to delete/to leave out/to neglect/to skip over
to omit/to dispense with/to make unnecesary/to save (time, trouble etc)
dash/Chinese dash ── (punct., double the length of the western dash)
